# AnnotationOverflowResolution.Boundary

**Structure**

Describes a boundary of a chart for overflow resolution.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Boundary
```

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: Automatically determines the boundary to use.
- **chart**: The entire chart.
- **plot**: The plot area.

items.description: Automatically determines the boundary to use.
items.name: automatic
